ja222:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja222:0.4_0: The Shorter Discourse on the Makkasilā.
ja222:2.1_0: But a person lives to come
ja222:2.3_0: A doer of good gets good,
ja222:2.4_0: a doer of bad gets bad.
ja222:2.5_0: Whatever kind of seed you sow,
ja222:2.6_0: such a person will carry off the fruit.”
